alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 8:53AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...Northern Inner Channel rivers and streams rising to near bankfull Saturday... The heavy rain from the Atmospheric River moving through the panhandle has past the Haines, Skagway and Juneau areas, but many area rivers and streams are still rising rapidly Saturday morning. Around 1 to 2 inches of rainfall was observed Friday night and early Saturday. The most significant impacts are expected along the Taiya River where a flood advisory has been issued. The Chilkat River near Haines and Klukwan is also rising but water levels are expected to remain within its banks through Saturday afternoon. All other area rivers and streams are running higher then usual due to the rainfall from last night and will remain high through the weekend. Recreators in and around area rivers and streams should monitor water levels through the holiday weekend.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
